name: Roly Poly (JamesSpencer)
description:
This game is a thing i whipped up overnight, this is the first full game I've created and would love to share it with anyone who would install it, I would like to hear feedback and criticism to improve my skills and this game.

Black squares send a player to the level select screen in a level and the main menu from the level select. Red squares are teleporters that either teleport you to the next level or to a specified location. White boxes are movable and sometimes need pushing more than once. The final level is more difficult but once you discover it's secret, it becomes easy.

Despite appearances, the main menu is navigated by the ball and not by the mouse. Simply roll into the buttons to use them, same with any other objects in the game.

Created using unity 2018.2.2f1
